stories.original_summary: Scientists have managed to observe solar neutrinos carrying out a rare atomic transformation deep underground, converting carbon-13 into nitrogen-13 inside the SNO+ detector. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Spot Ethereal Sun Motes Causing Deep Earth Transmutations!
stories.fantasy_story: Deep within the earth, skilled wizards have observed tiny, ethereal sun motes slipping through solid rock. These elusive sprites caused a rare alchemical change, turning dark minerals into lighter ones. Using a great arcane chamber, the wizards tracked faint glimmers, confirming this magical transformation.

stories.original_headline: Scientists find dark chocolate ingredient that slows aging
stories.original_summary: Scientists have uncovered a surprising link between dark chocolate and slower aging. A natural cocoa compound called theobromine was found in higher levels among people who appeared biologically younger than their real age.
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Dark Cocoa's Youth-Preserving Magic!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has made a wondrous discovery! An enchanted essence found in dark cocoa beans seems to preserve youth. Those who partook of this special confection often appeared many years younger than their true age, hinting at a powerful anti-aging magic.
